tool.name: Get summary of factors
tool.description: Produce a summary table of variable factors of a MetaboLights study

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

tool.help:
=============================================== Get summary of factors for a MetaboLights study ===============================================
This tool returns a table of sample names and related associated factor values. The tool calculates this by inspecting the ISA study and assay tables and computes the study groups and associated sample names.
----- Input -----
ISA-Tab input source ==================== Choose an input source, either direct from Metabolights or from an ISA-Tab history item that has already been downloaded or created in Galaxy.
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= If the input source is Metabolights, then provide the MTBLS identifier available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.
ISA-Tab datatype history item ============================= If the input source is an ISA-Tab history item, select from existing data history items. ISA-Tab items can be created by using the Metabolights downloader or the ISA-Tab metadata creation tools.
------ Output ------
Factor summary table ====================
A list of sample names and factor name-value pairs JSON list. e.g.
::
[ { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex1-cyp79-48h-Ag-3" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex1-cyp79-48h-Ag-4" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex1-cyp79-48h-Ag-1" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex2-Col0-48h-Ag-3" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex1-Col0-48h-Ag-4" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex1-cyp79-48h-Ag-2" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex2-Col0-48h-Ag-1" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex1-Col0-48h-Ag-3" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex1-Col0-48h-Ag-2" }, { "replicate": "Exp1", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex1-Col0-48h-Ag-1" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex2-cyp79-48h-Ag-4" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex2-cyp79-48h-Ag-1" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex2-Col0-48h-Ag-4" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex2-cyp79-48h-Ag-2" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "Col-0", "name": "Ex2-Col0-48h-Ag-2" }, { "replicate": "Exp2", "genotype": "cyp79", "name": "Ex2-cyp79-48h-Ag-3" } ]
